name: Energy Enhancement
desc: This built-in modification, specific to all TTE ships, reroutes the energy flow of the ships shields to superchargers that affect any energy weapons equipped. It increases their damage by %s, decreases flux use by %s, increases range by %s and increases the speed of pulse projectiles by %s. Note: Range extension is cumulative with Integrated Targeting Unit and Dedicated Targeting Core.
short: Increases energy bolt weapon damage, reduces flux use and extends weapon range.
